GameModel.Things.LivingThings

Class LivingThing

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel.Things.Thing
      • GameModel.Things.LivingThings.LivingThing
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animal, Body, BodyPart, Character, Plant

    public class LivingThing
extends Thing
    A Living Object has health. It needs to eat,drink, and reproduce in order to survive.
